entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch help is not localized #22100
  • [API Compat] Pin Microsoft.CodeAnalysis dependency to 4.0.0 once it ships #22090
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • Untriaged, untagged issue #22025
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 2, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 2 #sdk-113518-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC2 #21964
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-113435-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #21930
  • EF Core Migrations command broken with .Net 6 RC1 on M1 Mac (see notes) #22085
  • DateTime.Now on Linux has wrong timezone #22082

PullRequests

Created

  • Add a target and tests for re-generating scoped css files as part of hot reload #22103
    Area-AspNetCore
  • remove duplicate config files from sdk layout #22087
    Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #22072
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add dotnet-format to source-build dependency graph #22084
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Configure an environment variable when BrowserRefresh agent is injected #22023
    Servicing-consider, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #21199
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update handling of SelfContained and RuntimeIdentifier properties when specified on the command line #21986
    Area-NetSDK
  • [Razor] Fix up-to-date check on static web assets #22045
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update System.CommandLine version #21321
    Area-CLI
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22035
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22001
    Area-Infrastructure
